segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Has this been a problem before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have had it on and off for the past three years . It's just gotten much worse these past two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you only feel this way when you stomach is empty ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After I've eaten , it goes away for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have regular bowel movements ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me take a look at your abdomen . Lie down on your back and bend your knees up . OK . relax ... Alright , it seems like you have a duodenal ulcer , but we'll have to run some tests before I can be certain . You should get a good rest first and try not to strain your stomach too much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not too serious , but it'll take you some time to recover , so you'll need to be patient .
segments.speaker: S1
